[Helmsman's Recourse](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1858)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Meteor Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=13)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This [standard-grade darkwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=312) [meteor shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=13) (Hardness 7, HP 28, BT 14) is a wheel from a ship. While wielding the shield, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) and to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39).

The shield has Hardness 8, HP 60, and BT 30, and when you Activate the shield, it casts [_water walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=371) on you.

<traits>

</traits>

</row>

The shield has Hardness 11, HP 80, and BT 40; the item bonus is +2; and when you Activate the shield, you can breathe underwater for 10 minutes.
